/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray. Cars and buses are scattered along the street, hinting at the city's vibrant life. Trees line the street, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural charm and the constant movement of its streets.
